author: Zack Budryk
title: Conspiracy theorists who claim 5G linked to coronavirus believed to burn cell towers in Europe
description: Conspiracy theorists in Europe and the U.K. have allegedly set fire to several 5G towers in recent weeks, erroneously believing the mobile network is connected to the coronavirus pandemic.Britain has reported about...
content:
Conspiracy theorists in Europe and the U.K. have allegedly set fire to several 5G towers in recent weeks, erroneously believing the mobile network is connected to the coronavirus pandemic.
Britain has reported about 50 fires targeting towers or other 5G equi… [+1648 chars]
